page.title: 07Sodylt Farm & Home Farm
page.content: SODYLT FARM:This farm is 130 acre in area.There are 70 cattle,40 sheep and 10 pigs.The farm drops 60 m down to its boundary on the River Dee.The family have owned the farm since 1945.Most of the buildings have been built in the last 10 years, but the farmhouse is a timbered frame 15th century building.The only crop on this farm is grass. HOME FARM:This neighbouring farm is 200 acres in area and also is bounded by the river.1000 sheep are intensively farmed together with 12 beef cattle. An interesting feature is to be found at the entrance to this farm in that the metal gates are made up of many horseshoes welded together to form patterns.
